Bulan Depan Transfer Kena Biaya, OVO Sebut Masih Hemat
04 Nov 2019, 06:16 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Foto: Ardan Adhi Chandra

Jakarta - Layanan dompet elektronik (e-wallet) OVO akan mengenakan biaya Rp 2.500 untuk transfer ke bank lain. Biaya ini berlaku mulai 12 Desember 2019. Para pengguna menanyakan informasi tersebut ke akun twitter resmi @ovo_id. Pihak OVO menjawab keluhan-keluhan tersebut dan mengamini rencana pemberlakuan biaya."Jangan khawatir transfer ke semua bank pake OVO masih hemat, hanya biaya Rp 2.500/transfer berlaku mulai 12 Desember 2019, tetap mudah dan praktis ya Kak dalam bertransaksi menggunakan OVO. Terima kasih," tulis balasan twit tersebut dikutip detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).Dari pengumuman di aplikasi yang diterima detikcom disebutkan, mulai 12 Desember 2019 biaya transfer ke semua bank bakal dikenakan tarif Rp 2.500 setiap transaksi.Kemudian juga diumumkan syarat dan ketentuan terkait biaya tersebut. Yakni hanya OVO Cash yang dapat ditransfer ke bank. Sebelumnya pengiriman uang ke bank melalui OVO gratis alias tanpa biaya.OVO merupakan layanan dompet digital yang dikelola oleh PT Visionet Internasional. Awalnya OVO merupakan aplikasi loyalitas yang mengelola point hasil belanja di pusat perbelanjaan milik Lippo Group.Pada 2017, OVO mendapatkan lisensi dari Bank Indonesia untuk menghadirkan layanan dompet digital. Agar meluaskan pangsa pasarnya, OVO menggandeng Tokopedia dan Grab.Dalam perjalanannya, OVO menjadi salah satu fintech besar di Indonesia. Sepanjang tahun 2018 saja, OVO mengklaim sudah menjalankan 1 miliar kali transaksi.Dengan masuknya OVO ke dalam daftar, kini Indonesia punya lima startup yang telah berstatus unicorn. Satu di antaranya bahkan telah berstatus decacorn.Simak Video "Mulai Desember, Transfer OVO ke Bank akan Dikenakan Biaya!"[Gambas:Video 20detik](kil/fdl)

Next Month Transfer is subject to fees, OVO Call is Still Saving
Nov 04 2019, 06:16 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Photo: Ardan Adhi Chandra

Jakarta - OVO e-wallet service will charge Rp 2,500 to transfer to another bank. This fee is valid from 12 December 2019. Users ask this information to the official Twitter account @ovo_id. OVO parties answered these complaints and agreed on the cost enforcement plan. "Don't worry, transfers to all banks using OVO are still economical, only Rp. 2,500 / transfer takes effect from December 12, 2019, it is still easy and practical, Sis, in making transactions using OVO. Thank you , "wrote the reply tweet quoted detikcom, Monday (4/11/2019). From the announcement on the application received by detikcom mentioned, starting December 12, 2019 transfer fees to all banks will be charged a rate of Rp 2,500 per transaction. Then also the terms and conditions will be announced related to these costs. Ie, only OVO Cash can be transferred to banks. Previously, sending money to banks through OVO was free or without cost. Novo is a digital wallet service managed by PT Visionet Internasional. Initially OVO was a loyalty application that manages shopping results points at Lippo Group's shopping center. In 2017, OVO obtained a license from Bank Indonesia to provide digital wallet services. In order to expand its market share, OVO took Tokopedia and Grab. In its journey, OVO became one of the major finteches in Indonesia. During 2018, OVO claimed to have run 1 billion transactions. With OVO being included in the list, Indonesia now has five startups that have unicorn status. One of them even has decacorn status.
